com.att.research.xacml.api

Class DataTypeFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.att.research.xacml.api.DataTypeFactory
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CustomDataTypeFactory, StdDataTypeFactory

    public abstract class DataTypeFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class for mapping data type Identifiers to DataType objects. The static newInstance method looks for the class name of the class extending DataTypeFactory by looking for the property: xacml.dataTypeFactory in the following places (in order): 1. System properties 2. The xacml.properties file which is located by: a) System.getProperty("xacml.properties") b) java.home/xacml.properties 3. If the class name is not found in one of these properties, the default is: com.att.research.xacml.std.StdDataTypeFactory
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.2 $
    Author:
    Christopher A. Rath

      • getDataType

        public abstract DataType<?> getDataType(Identifier dataTypeId)
        Maps the given Identifier representing a XACML data type id to a DataType object implementing that data type.
        Parameters:
        dataTypeId - the Identifier of the DataType to retrieve.
        Returns:
        the DataType with the given Identifier or null if there is no match.
